attributes.action: Introduce extra lessons in secondary schools, possibly junior schools which tells of the dangers of alcohol, drugs and tobacco.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think there sould be an extra lesson in the Curriculum to all secondary schools, possibly even juniors school, which tells the dangers of alcohol, drugs and tobacco. becasue kids have a taste of alcohol especially vodka and like the taste of it so have more and not relising they took too much and end up in hospital, and also when they are hooked on something like drugs etc, it's hard for them to get off it, and then end up doing criminal things.
